ForceLover Description: Force a unit to become lovers with another unit
trait_aromantic_info: They do not desire love unlike most
trait_aromantic_info_2: It's not because they have not found the right person, they just feel this way
trait_homoromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the same sex
trait_homoromantic_info_2: I love people who are like me!
trait_heteroromantic_info: They would like to only romantically be involved with the different sex
trait_biromantic_info_2: Pulls sexes without needing to fuck any of them. What's your excuse?
trait_asexual_info: They do not desire sex unlike most
trait_asexual_info_2: Sex is so weird. It's soggy and time consuming.
trait_heterosexual_info: They prefer having sex with the opposite sex
trait_homosexual_info: They prefer having sex with the same sex
trait_homosexual_info_2: It ain't a choice, that much can be told.
trait_bisexual_info: They love having sex with both sexes
Incest Description: Whether family members can become lovers of one another. Aka, the good ol' medieval times.
ForbiddenLove Description:
When the game rolls for two lovers that cannot reproduce together (this roll happens every time they socialize), this determines how likely it is that they will end up together. Do not set this too high or you will have population collapse! 

Example: Gay couples with the sexual reproduction method.
AllowCrossSpeciesLove Description: Whether different subspecies should be able to love each other.
MustBeSmart Description: Whether the two subspecies involved have to have all their brain functions in order to love each other.
MustBeXenophile Description: Whether the initiating lover has to be xenophile in order to love another subspecies unlike them. The receiving lover does NOT need to be xenophile, but they cannot be xenophobic.
